author: Kelly Richards
comment: I love the idea behind this app, but I'm also having the issue where the incoming call shows up on the screen, but no ringing/audio. The incoming call screen shows up for me even if the screen is locked/off, but just no ringing.   I realize this is an early version so I'm going to keep the app for a while and hope that this bug gets resolved, because this app could be very useful! Thanks!

reply.author: Chintan Trivedi
reply.content: Thank you for your patience and positive review. I agree that there are quite a few major bugs in the current version but I'll try to address those as soon as I get some time from my studies!! Expect major fixes in this week itself and congratulations for your new watch!!

title: Great idea

author: Jon Pidduck
comment: This app doesn't activate my phone's fibration function. Just delivers a notification that can only be read once you've unlocked your phone and accessed it via the notifications menu. Plus it needs shorter 'call' delays. 10 or even 5 seconds. Uninstalling until this is working properly.
title: Good idea, poor execution

author: Chirag Chaudhari
comment: Works perfectly when the screen is on but when it is off, I have to unlock the phone and then the fake call pops up. Will change the stars after this issue is fixed :)
title: Good

author: danial golpour
comment: You know i have got a galaxy grand prime and when i fake a call its not like real you know ...
title: Great but...

author: Giovonni Fareed
comment: No audio/vibrate ring.. Does not show if lockscreen enabled

reply.author: Chintan Trivedi
reply.content: I'll look to it as to why it does not have audio on a Note 3. Sorry for the bug. Watch out for a fix in an update in coming weeks. Thank you for your feedback.

title: No audio

author: Leon van Geldern
comment: Would be great if it had sound
title: Great idea but...

author: Smit Shilu
comment: Its really good and very useful app
title: Nice app
